titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7701

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Louisville, Septr 11th 1862
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: of State --
Sir --
I have this day issued & delivered the following Commissions viz:
Sa M Purcell -- Captain -- J. M. Malory 1st Lieut -- Thomas Alexander 2d Lieut: Samuel Duncan Captain -- H. W. Rose 1st Lieut. & G. F. Barnes 2d-Lieut -- all dated 6 September 1862 --

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl. Ken Vols
Also Com: issd. to Wm H. Botts asst surgeon -- date Sep. 11. 1862 --

John W. Finnell
Adjt. Genl. Ken. Vols:
